# Welcome {-}

<a href="https://bioconductor.org"><img src="`r rmarkdown::metadata[["cover-image"]]`" width="200" alt="Bioconductor Sticker" align="right" style="margin: 0 1em 0 1em" /></a> 

This site contains the introductory chapters for the `r BiocStyle::Biocbook("OSCA", label='__"Orchestrating Single-Cell Analysis with Bioconductor"__ book')`.
It describes how to install R and [Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org) packages, provides some links to resources to learn R,
describes how to load datasets into an R session, provides an overview of the `SingleCellExperiment` class,
and provides a "quick start" demonstration for basic single-cell RNA-seq analyses.
